explanation: [0-0] A person is walking forward in a forest. The ground is covered with withered and green grass, and there are some green trees in the background. She is wearing black pants and a pair of brown sneakers, revealing white striped socks.

[0-5] Then the person stops and sets up a wooden stake in front of her. The camera then zooms out to show a young woman in an orange T-shirt, wearing black gloves, holding a short piece of wood and hitting the stake forcefully. The camera then zooms in twice to give a close-up of the stake being hit. The gloved hands then grip the stake, twist it, and pull it out, revealing a round hole in the ground.
